text: Hi all, I'm trying to create a custom CRM object. I notice once you create it, you can't view the associated object in the list view. Is there some way to get that to appear (and potentially searchable)?
What would you want to do with this API? <@U7TAZ6V2Q> <@UBT0AHWLD>

Hi <@UNL3L46D7> weâ€™re working on some tools that will help theme developers do things faster, and so the ability to audit their theme files as well as automate the writing of new files will be of great interest!
Cool! We should have an API in developer preview shortly into the new year!

Hi Everyone!  Looking for some help on the deals API.  I am using this endpoint "*/crm/v3/objects/deals/search"* to get information about each deal.  I am trying to track when a deal enters and exits each stage.  However, I am having a hard time understanding how the datetime for each enter/exit field is recorded.  When I move a field to a new stage, I can see that the date time for that stage enter field is now there, but when I move it out of that stage, that field is now reset back to null, and no exit time is ever recorded.

Is there a specific amount of time a deal has to sit in a stage  before the  enter/exit date will be recorded?

Hi Everyone, Facing an issue with the Hubdb API. There is a select column in hubdb table. It has option1 , option2 and option3. I want to fetch those entries which has selected option1 or option2. But In hubdb api, it says that it is not support ORing as of now. Is there any option or alternate to achieve?
